== Ozone ==
Relevance to
** <nowiki>[[Lubuntu | Lubuntu]]</nowiki>

=== Concept ===

The Ozone theme gets revamped for the next release of Lubuntu Oneiric Ocelot. Combining both GTK2 and GTK3 is an added difficulty trying to make the whole environment unified. For that purpose, new GTK apps will use the Unico engine (included in forwarding Ubuntu repositories; download <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/unico|here]]</nowiki> for testing on Natty).

=== Theme ===
Ozone 2  is based on <nowiki>[[http://lassekongo83.deviantart.com/art/Zukitwo-203936861|ZukiTwo]]</nowiki> by Lassekongo (under GPL license). Using Pixmap / Murrine engine (gtk2) and Unico (gtk3). Download the whole <nowiki>[[attachment:ozone2.tar.gz|theme]]</nowiki> for both window and controls (52 kb). Fixed some <nowiki>[[http://paste.ubuntu.com/691858/|bugs]]</nowiki>.
